NASHVILLE, Tenn., Nov. 6, 2015 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- A new report released today from the National League of Cities (NLC) explores trends in mobility and technology in cities and identifies what cities can do to move seamlessly and efficiently into the future of mobility.
